changeSet.id: edit early_alert change trigger to iterate msql
changeSet.author: dan.mccallum
changeSet.sql:
CREATE TRIGGER ${schema}.tr_insert_directory_person_early_alert on ${schema}.early_alert FOR INSERT, UPDATE AS IF ${schema}.DIRECTORY_PERSON_REFRESH_RUNNING() = 0 BEGIN
DECLARE @person_id UNIQUEIDENTIFIER DECLARE inserted_cur CURSOR FORWARD_ONLY READ_ONLY LOCAL FOR SELECT person_id FROM inserted
OPEN inserted_cur
FETCH NEXT FROM inserted_cur INTO @person_id WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0 BEGIN EXEC ${schema}.update_directory_person_from_view_where_person_id @person_id FETCH NEXT FROM inserted_cur INTO @person_id END
CLOSE inserted_cur DEALLOCATE inserted_cur
END
